item.description:
From the Beehive website...

Time to get your samba on! Come celebrate Carnival at The Beehive.
With an amazing line up of Brazillian musicians and dancers this will be a "huge" event.
Starting with a smooth and powerful Bossa Nova set with pianist-composer Alfredo Cardim (Rio de Janeiro) and vocalist-guiatrist Joao Marcos we will then "heat up" the evening with Marcus Santos and full blown Brazillian Samba drum band and dancers. Come and party with us Brazillian style!
Marcus Santos is:
"one of the best Brazilian percussionists period"
Brazilian Times



I can't make it, but it should be a great event if other people want to meet up there!
Thanks for the idea, Racheal!
item.name: Carnival @ Beehive
